headline: Hilton Announces Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2025 Earnings Release Date
summary: MCLEAN, Va., January 13, 2026--Hilton Worldwide Holdings Inc. (NYSE: HLT) will report fourth quarter and full year 2025 financial results before the stock market opens on Wednesday, Feb. 11, 2026, followed by a conference call at 9 a.m. EST. Christopher J. Nassetta, president & chief executive officer, Hilton, and Kevin Jacobs, executive vice president & chief financial officer, Hilton, will discuss the company's performance and lead a question-and-answer session.
